title: client won't start
body:
It doesn't even show the riot games logo that appears before the League Client. I checked in task manager and RiotClientServices.exe appears there for a few seconds before just closing itself.

Doesn't appear to be my antivirus because I tried turning it off temporarily and had the same results. Please fix your shit.

replies.body:
> To sumarize issue with client not starting, if you attempt to start the client within about a minute after closing it, the task manager will show its process for a second and then the client terminates itself, if you keep opening it, it keeps terminating itself, you need to let it rest for about a minute to be able to open it again. This is extremly troubling when ur game crashes and u try to reconnect, or after game ends and ur client crashes, etc etc

> im talking about client on windows 10 here ofc, can provide a vid if needed

Yeah that is a different issue. The issue described in this thread and a few others created around the time this thread was created was an issue where even if you reinstalled or restarted your computer it would not start up. This only happened on Windows 7 and only happened for some Windows 7 users not all.

I am not sure what is the current status on the bug where attempting to start League while its shutting down fails. We are aware of it though.

> Same here EUW Windows 10

Would you be able to reach out to player support? We identified an issue with Windows 7 which I believe was just fixed 2 hours ago. I don't believe we are aware of an issue with these symptoms on Windows 10.

To sumarize issue with client not starting, if you attempt to start the client within about a minute after closing it, the task manager will show its process for a second and then the client terminates itself, if you keep opening it, it keeps terminating itself, you need to let it rest for about a minute to be able to open it again. This is extremly troubling when ur game crashes and u try to reconnect, or after game ends and ur client crashes, etc etc

im talking about client on windows 10 here ofc, can provide a vid if needed
What version of Windows are you using? Out of curiosity... is it Windows 7?
same but i got a fix . open it and when the process is shown in task manager , kill it then reopen client . should work

> [{quoted}](name=Walking Boobs,realm=EUW,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=zzjrIZuf,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2020-02-20T19:40:54.564+0000)
>
> same but i got a fix . open it and when the process is shown in task manager , kill it then reopen client . should work

doesn't work

Hey, sorry you experienced this issue. We're aware of the problem and we're working on a fix. Can you please reach out to Player Support if you haven't already?

https://support-leagueoflegends.riotgames.com/hc/en-us
